item.description: So, it's Valentines Day weekend and you don't have that someone special to take you out, don't want to hear about, how this one has a special night planned with their someone special, significant other, or there hot date. So join us for what I hope to be a more fun and relaxed evening of karaoke and dance at the Legendary Rosebud Bar and Grill in Davis Sq. No cover charge, just good fun, hopefully you will meet other like minded singles who enjoy karaoke and good dance music. No quiet tables in the corner with candle light, no soft romantic music playing in the background. Hopefully we hear some anti-love songs that evening. So plan on joining us on Feb 15th. BTW if you have a someone special in your life, no problem come as a couple, we won't discriminate. All our welcome, just don't expect a special , romantic night, be ready to rock, and NO Love Songs allowed....
item.name: The Un-Valentines Weekend Singles Karaoke & Dance Mixer
